product_name: Stansport Propane Grill Stove with Piezo - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Bring your backyard grilling skills to the campsite with the Stansport Propane Grill stove with Piezo. It fires up quickly without matches and has a nonstick grill for easy cleanup. The grill stove features a 12,000 BTU tube burner; grate has 180 sq. in. for grilling and cooking. Piezo ignitor allows for match-free lighting. Nonstick coated grate provides easy cleanup after cooking; also includes a stainless-steel drip pan. Built-in windscreen helps keep the stove burning in windy conditions. Includes a pressure regulator for use at high altitudes. Runs on propane canisters, not included. Due to flammable item shipping restrictions, we cannot sell 16.4-oz. propane canisters online; they are available at REI retail stores. Closeout.
short_description: Bring your backyard grilling skills to the campsite with the Stansport Propane Grill stove with Piezo. It fires up quickly without matches and has a nonstick grill for easy cleanup.
